text: Ojo kase az sumo dust dorad, ki ʙoƣe az daraxtoni xurmo va angur dosta ʙosad va zeri on cujʙorho oʙi sirin ravon ʙosad va uro dar on ʙoƣ az har guna mevaho ʙosad va dar hole, ki piri uro faro girad va nametavonad in guna ʙoƣdori kunad va farzandoni za'if va notavon dorad, nametavonand uro jori kunand. Nogahon girdʙode, ki otase dar on ast, ʙar on ʙivazad va ʙoƣ ʙisuzad? Incunin Alloh ojotro ʙaroi sumo ʙajon mekunad, to ʙiandesed
